text: Armed and Dangerous is a 1986 American comedy movie directed by Mark L. Lester and starring John Candy, Eugene Levy, Meg Ryan, Kenneth McMillan, Brion James, Larry Hankin, Tito Puente. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and box office reviews were poor. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:1986 crime movies Category:1980s criminal comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Mark L. Lester Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Armed and Dangerous (1986 movie)
